pages.text:
DISCOVER THE ULTIMATE MEMBERSHIP EXPERIENCE AT EASTPOINTE COUNTRY CLUB
Eastpointe Country Club is more than just a club—it’s a vibrant community where exceptional golf, dining, and social opportunities come together to create an unparalleled lifestyle. Our dedicated team is committed to providing world-class experiences in a welcoming, home-like environment.
BOOK A TOUR
FULL GOLF MEMBERSHIP
Both Eastpointe residents and non-residents can enjoy unlimited access to both championship courses, full use of all practice areas, and a vibrant calendar of tournaments, leagues, and social golf events—ideal for golfers seeking year-round play and community. Membership also includes access to all of Eastpointe’s resort-style amenities, from tennis and pickleball to fitness, dining, pools, and more.
LEARN MORE
YOUNG EXECUTIVE MEMBERSHIP
Our Young Executive Membership—available to Eastpointe residents and non-residents under 40—includes full golf privileges, access to both courses and practice facilities, and entry to tournaments and events, all at a reduced rate. It’s a smart choice for the rising generation of golf enthusiasts. Members also enjoy full access to Eastpointe’s resort-style amenities, including tennis, pickleball, fitness, dining, pools, and more.
LEARN MORE
RESIDENT SOCIAL MEMBERSHIP
All new Eastpointe homeowners are required to hold a Resident Social Membership, which includes access to clubhouse dining, year-round social events, tennis, pickleball, fitness, and The Pointe. Optional upgrades to golf tiers allow added benefits for those looking to play.
LEARN MORE
ENDLESS BENEFITS AWAIT
From seamless tee time bookings to exclusive member events, Eastpointe Country Club offers the very best in country club living. Enjoy two championship golf courses, resort-style amenities, modern fitness, tennis, pickleball, and relaxing pools—all in a beautifully maintained, welcoming setting. Connect with a friendly, inclusive community where friendships grow and every day brings something new. With exquisite dining and a vibrant social scene, Eastpointe is country club living at its finest.

Directions
From I-95 South
Take I-95 North toward Jupiter
Exit at Donald Ross Road (Exit 83) and turn left (west)
Continue on Donald Ross Road for approx. 1.5 miles
Turn right onto Eastpointe Boulevard and follow signs to gatehouse
From I-95 North
Take I-95 South toward Palm Beach Gardens
Exit at Donald Ross Road (Exit 83) and turn right (west)
Drive about 1.5 miles on Donald Ross Road
Turn right onto Eastpointe Boulevard, continue to gatehouse
From Florida’s Turnpike South
Take Turnpike northbound toward Palm Beach Gardens
Exit at PGA Boulevard (Exit 109) and turn right (east)
Go approx. 2.5 miles, turn left onto Central Boulevard
Continue north 2 miles, turn left onto Donald Ross Road
Then left onto Eastpointe Boulevard
From Florida’s Turnpike North
Take Turnpike southbound toward Palm Beach Gardens
Exit at PGA Boulevard (Exit 109) and turn left (east)
Drive about 2.5 miles, turn left onto Central Boulevard
Head north 2 miles, turn left onto Donald Ross Road
Then left onto Eastpointe Boulevard

HOST UNFORGETTABLE EVENTS AT EASTPOINTE
At Eastpointe Country Club, we believe every event should be extraordinary. Whether you're planning a wedding, corporate gathering, or private celebration, our picturesque venue, expert team, and unparalleled attention to detail ensure your event is truly unforgettable.
BOOK A TOUR
VERSATILE EVENT VENUES FOR EVERY OCCASION
Eastpointe Country Club offers a variety of stunning event spaces designed to suit gatherings of any size or style:
GRAND DINING ROOM
Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows with breathtaking views of pristine greens and sparkling waters, this elegant space is perfect for weddings, galas, and large celebrations.
BANQUET ROOMS
Ideal for corporate meetings, luncheons, or intimate celebrations, these versatile spaces can be tailored to your needs.
OUTDOOR SPACES
Surround your event with the beauty of South Florida in our scenic outdoor areas, complete with lush landscapes, serene water features, and picturesque golf course views.

EXCEPTIONAL CATERING AND EVENT PLANNING SERVICES
From customized menus to first-class service, our dedicated team will work with you every step of the way to ensure your event exceeds expectations.
SCHEDULE A TOUR
Card 1
CUSTOMIZED MENUS
Collaborate with our Executive Chef and Catering Director to create a menu tailored to your preferences. From traditional plated dinners to themed culinary experiences, your guests will be delighted by the flavors and presentation.
Card 2
EXPERT PLANNING SUPPORT
Our experienced team will guide you through every detail, from décor and entertainment to timelines and logistics, ensuring a seamless and stress-free planning process.
Card 3
CELEBRATE LIFE’S MILESTONES AT EASTPOINTE
From weddings and anniversaries to birthdays, showers, and graduations, life is full of reasons to celebrate. Let Eastpointe provide the setting, expertise, and personal touch that will make your event truly memorable.
CONTACT INFORMATION
Whether you're hosting a grand celebration or an intimate gathering, Eastpointe Country Club offers the perfect venue, impeccable service, and the expertise to bring your vision to life. Celebrate life’s most important moments with us.
Angela Bravo
